title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Lead the design and development of new features for EDU domain web applications, enhancing functionality for respective users.
Develop scalable modules features by utilizing technologies like Angular, MVC, .NET Core, WebAPI, and SQL Server.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams (product, design, and QA) to ensure seamless integration and smooth user experience across all platforms.
Troubleshoot, resolve, and prioritise production issues, ensuring system stability and minimizing downtime for end users.
Contribute to the architectural design and refactoring efforts to improve code maintainability, performance, and scalability.

title: Junior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Assisted in the design and development of features for web applications in EDU domain.
Collaborated with senior developers to debug and resolve high-priority issues, ensuring a smooth user experience and reducing downtime.
Worked with Angular, .NET Core, Web API and SQL Server to build and maintain both frontend and backend components of the application.
Participated in unit testing, code reviews, and documentation, contributing to the overall quality and maintainability of the codebase.
Assisted in optimizing database queries and improving the performance of the application, handling both front-end and back-end tasks as needed.

title: Graduate Trainee
responsibilities: Completed the Horizon training program at Civica, gaining comprehensive expertise in ASP.NET, ASP.NET Core, ASP.NET Web API, Angular, and SQL Server.
Developed practical projects to apply theoretical knowledge, showcasing hands-on experience in web application development and software architecture, available on GitHub.
Gained proficiency in unit testing and repository management systems, ensuring robust and maintainable code.
Enhanced corporate communication skills, including formal email writing and professional interaction within a team environment.
Collaborated on team projects, applying agile methodologies and best practices in software development.

title: Software Developer Trainee
responsibilities: Completed a MEAN stack internship at Rishabh Software, gaining hands-on experience in building full-stack applications using Angular, MongoDB, Express, and Node.js.
Developed and deployed multiple practice projects, demonstrating proficiency in front-end (Angular) and back-end (Node.js, Express) development, with project code available on GitHub.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs using Express.js, and integrated with MongoDB to manage data storage and retrieval efficiently.
Gained practical knowledge of version control systems like Git, agile development methodologies, and collaborative coding practices.

title: Robocon Member
responsibilities: Participated as a key member of the college team in Robocon, an international robotics competition, contributing to the design and development of autonomous robots.
Programmed micro-controllers for controlling Bluetooth-enabled devices and sensors, ensuring precise data reading and real-time operational adjustments.
Gained hands-on experience in circuit design, including both analog and digital components, to ensure reliable communication between hardware and software systems.
Collaborated on the integration of various sensors (e.g., distance, temperature, and motion sensors) to enhance the robot’s functionality and decision-making abilities.
Developed problem-solving and troubleshooting skills by debugging hardware and software issues under time pressure, ensuring the robot’s smooth operation during the contest.
